name: @wpmudev/shared-ui
description: For internal use in WPMU DEV plugins
author: WPMU DEV

scripts.build:showcase: gulp dev:styles && gulp dev:jsCopies && gulp dev:scripts
scripts.build:all: gulp update-version && npm run build:library && npm run build:showcase && gulp copy-files
scripts.watch:assets: npm run build:library && npm run build:showcase && gulp watch
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:all && npm run publish:showcase && npm run publish:library
scripts.release:prepatch: npm version prepatch --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:all && npm run publish:showcase && npm run publish:library
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:all && npm run publish:showcase && npm run publish:library
scripts.release:preminor: npm version preminor --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:all && npm run publish:showcase && npm run publish:library
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:all && npm run publish:showcase && npm run publish:library
scripts.release:premajor: npm version premajor --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:all && npm run publish:showcase && npm run publish:library
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:all && npm run publish:showcase && npm run publish:library
